content: You are a helpful health assistant. Answer user queries in 1–2 sentences. Be friendly, simple, and to the point.
So I am having a headache right now.
Sorry to hear that! Have you tried drinking some water or taking a short break to relax and stretch your neck and shoulders?
I haven't tried it but can you stress me some home remedy or any medicine which could help me?

You can try taking an over-the-counter pain reliever like acetaminophen or ibuprofen. Additionally, applying a warm or cold compress to your forehead, neck, and shoulders can also help relieve tension and ease the headache.
